lead_paragraph: An advocate commends passage of a bill in the Senate, and a professor suggests a way to help local law enforcement use DNA evidence more promptly.

headline.main: For Survivors of Rape, a Step Forward in the Senate
headline.print_headline: For Survivors of Rape, a Step Forward in the Senate

snippet: An advocate commends passage of a bill in the Senate, and a professor suggests a way to help local law enforcement use DNA evidence more promptly.
